pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena therā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantā lābhino honti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:1.4: “etarahi kho, āvuso, therā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantā lābhino honti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:1.6: Atha kho chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṃ—“amhepi, bhaginiyo, upasaṅkamatha; mayampi ovadissāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:1.8: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo yena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:1.9: upasaṅkamitvā chabbaggiye bhikkhū abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:1.10: Atha kho chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunīnaṃ parittaññeva dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā divasaṃ tiracchānakathāya vītināmetvā uyyojesuṃ—“gacchatha, bhaginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:1.12: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu. Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho tā bhikkhuniyo bhagavā etadavoca—“kacci, bhikkhuniyo, ovādo iddho ahosī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:1.16: Ayyā chabbaggiyā parittaññeva dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā divasaṃ tiracchānakathāya vītināmetvā uyyojesun”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:1.17: Atha kho bhagavā tā bhikkhuniyo dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṃsesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:1.18: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahaṃsitā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:1.19: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā chabbaggiye bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:1.20: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, bhikkhunīnaṃ parittaññeva dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā divasaṃ tiracchānakathāya vītināmetvā uyyojethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:1.23: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, bhikkhunīnaṃ parittaññeva dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā divasaṃ tiracchānakathāya vītināmetvā uyyojessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:1.24: Netaṃ, moghapurisā, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:1.30: Yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṃgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:1.32: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ bhikkhunovādakaṃ sammanneyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:1.36: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno bhikkhunovādakassa sammuti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:1.42: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno bhikkhunovādakassa sammuti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:1.45: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:1.46: Atha kho bhagavā chabbaggiye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:1.47: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:1.48: “Yo pana bhikkhu asammato bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:1.49: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena therā bhikkhū sammatā bhikkhuniyo ovadantā tatheva lābhino honti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:2.3: “etarahi kho, āvuso, therā bhikkhū sammatā bhikkhuniyo ovadantā tatheva lābhino honti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:2.4: Handāvuso, mayampi nissīmaṃ gantvā aññamaññaṃ bhikkhunovādakaṃ sammannitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:2.5: Atha kho chabbaggiyā bhikkhū nissīmaṃ gantvā aññamaññaṃ bhikkhunovādakaṃ sammannitvā bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṃ—“mayampi, bhaginiyo, sammatā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:2.9: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo yena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā chabbaggiye bhikkhū abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:2.11: Atha kho chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunīnaṃ parittaññeva dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā divasaṃ tiracchānakathāya vītināmetvā uyyojesuṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:2.13: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:2.15: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho tā bhikkhuniyo bhagavā etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:2.18: Ayyā chabbaggiyā parittaññeva dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā divasaṃ tiracchānakathāya vītināmetvā uyyojesun”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:2.19: Atha kho bhagavā tā bhikkhuniyo dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:2.20: atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahaṃsitā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:2.21: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā chabbaggiye bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:2.22: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, bhikkhunīnaṃ parittaññeva dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā divasaṃ tiracchānakathāya vītināmetvā uyyojethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:2.25: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, bhikkhunīnaṃ parittaññeva dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā divasaṃ tiracchānakathāya vītināmetvā uyyojessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:2.26: Netaṃ, moghapurisā, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:2.29: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ bhikkhunovādakaṃ sammannituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:2.30: Sīlavā hoti, pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:2.31: bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ abhivadanti tathārūpāssa dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasā anupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:2.32: ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena svāgatāni honti suvibhattāni suppavattīni suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanaso;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:2.36: na kho panetaṃ bhagavantaṃ uddissa pabbajitāya kāsāyavatthavasanāya garudhammaṃ ajjhāpannapubbo hoti;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:2.38: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, imehi aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ bhikkhunovādakaṃ sammannitun”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.1.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto bhikkhūti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.1.14: Tena sammatena bhikkhunā pariveṇaṃ sammajjitvā pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā āsanaṃ paññapetvā dutiyaṃ gahetvā nisīditabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.1.15: Bhikkhunīhi tattha gantvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīditabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.1.21: “Vassasatūpasampannāya bhikkhuniyā tadahupasampannassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ kātabbaṃ;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.1.22: ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.1.23: Na bhikkhuniyā abhikkhuke āvāse vassaṃ vasitabbaṃ;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.1.24: ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.1.26: iṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.1.28: garudhammaṃ ajjhāpannāya bhikkhuniyā ubhatosaṃghe pakkhamānattaṃ caritabbaṃ;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.1.30: dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya sikkhamānāya ubhatosaṃghe upasampadā pariyesitabbā;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.1.32: na bhikkhuniyā kenaci pariyāyena bhikkhu akkositabbo paribhāsitabbo;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.1.34: ajjatagge ovaṭo bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhūsu vacanapatho, anovaṭo bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīsu vacanapatho;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.1.35: ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.1.36: Sace “samaggāmhāyyā”ti bhaṇantaṃ aññaṃ dhammaṃ bhaṇati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.1.37: Sace “vaggāmhāyyā”ti bhaṇantaṃ aṭṭha garudhamme bhaṇati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.1.38: Ovādaṃ aniyyādetvā aññaṃ dhammaṃ bhaṇati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.2.1: Adhammakamme adhammakammasaññī vaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṃghaṃ vaggasaññī ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.2.2: Adhammakamme adhammakammasaññī vaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṃghaṃ vematiko ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.2.3: Adhammakamme adhammakammasaññī vaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṃghaṃ samaggasaññī ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.2.4: Adhammakamme vematiko vaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṃghaṃ vaggasaññī ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.2.5: Adhammakamme vematiko vaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṃghaṃ vematiko ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.2.6: Adhammakamme vematiko vaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṃghaṃ samaggasaññī ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.2.7: Adhammakamme dhammakammasaññī vaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṃghaṃ vaggasaññī ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.2.8: Adhammakamme dhammakammasaññī vaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṃghaṃ vematiko ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.2.9: Adhammakamme dhammakammasaññī vaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṃghaṃ samaggasaññī ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.2.10: Adhammakamme adhammakammasaññī samaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṃghaṃ vaggasaññī ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.2.11: Adhammakamme adhammakammasaññī samaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṃghaṃ vematiko ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.2.12: Adhammakamme adhammakammasaññī samaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṃghaṃ samaggasaññī ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.2.13: Adhammakamme vematiko samaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṃghaṃ vaggasaññī ovadati … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.2.16: Adhammakamme dhammakammasaññī samaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṃghaṃ vaggasaññī ovadati … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.2.19: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññī vaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṃghaṃ vaggasaññī ovadati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.2.20: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññī vaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṃghaṃ vematiko ovadati … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.2.22: Dhammakamme vematiko vaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṃghaṃ vaggasaññī ovadati … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.2.25: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññī vaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṃghaṃ vaggasaññī ovadati … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.2.28: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññī samaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṃghaṃ vaggasaññī ovadati … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.2.31: Dhammakamme vematiko samaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṃghaṃ vaggasaññī ovadati … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.2.34: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññī samaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṃghaṃ vaggasaññī ovadati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.2.35: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññī samaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṃghaṃ vematiko ovadati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc21:3.2.36: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññī samaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṃghaṃ samaggasaññī ovadati, anāpatti.
